New Records: Sunil Chhetri scored his 94th international goal in the 38th minute
Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri gave India the lead with a penalty kick in the 38th minute
Rahmat Akbari equalized for Afghanistan in the 70th minute
Sharif Mukhammad scored the winning penalty for Afghanistan in the 88th minute
Post-Match Reflections: India's loss leaves them with just four points from four matches in the group
Qatar leads the group with nine points, while Afghanistan has also four points from as many matches
India needs to defeat Qatar in the away match to keep their hopes alive, with the final hope resting on the match against Kuwait on June 6, 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunil Chhetri scored the first goal of his 150th international appearance
India created several chances but faltered in the second half
The match was played at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium in Guwahati
